Module it.unipr.shopfx
Package it.unipr.accounts

Class Admin

java.lang.Object
it.unipr.accounts.Person
it.unipr.accounts.Employee
it.unipr.accounts.Admin
public class Admin extends Employee
The Admin class, as a child class of Employee, provides all the methods to administrate the entire system in addition to having all the Employee's methods
Since:
1.0
Version:
2.0
Author:
Tanzi Manuel 307720, Mamone Maximiliano 308214
